refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool for making coherent Rivendell backups

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: rdautoback8 is a command-line tool used for for creating coherent backups of the data (database+audiostore) used by the Rivendell Radio Automation System.

rdautoback8 takes exactly one argument: the name of a storage mount point that has been configured in fstab5. Upon startup, rdautoback8 will attempt to mount the specified mount point and make a copy of the following Rivendell data elements:

listitem.para: The Rivendell database specified by the current rd.conf5 configuration file.
The contents of the Rivendell audiostore, located at /var/snd.

refsect1.para: If a previous backup is already present on the target backup device, it will be incrementally updated so as to be a precise backup of the current data. After completing the backup, rdautoback8 will automatically unmount the backup device and remove its mount point.
